text:
Hi guys,

Please any ideas on this. I’ve been trying to use ‘hs init’ to link CLI with HubSpot portal and I keep getting ‘the request failed’. I updated/ran

`npm i -g @HubSpot/cli@latest` before `hs_init` so I am not sure why the check is failing. Pls anyone come across this? I am using HubSpot 7.0.1

_Opening <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/personal-access-key> in your web browser_
_? Enter your personal access key:  ***********************************************************************************************************_
_[ERROR] The request failed._
_[ERROR] Cannot destructure property ‘accountId’ of ‘(intermediate value)’ as it is undefined._

Hi everyone, i hope you're doing well! If we haven't met before, my name is Brooke, and I'm a dev advocate with HubSpot. I'm wanting to do some research about our Figma Design Kit for UI extensions, and need YOUR help :slightly_smiling_face: If you've used our figma design kit before, <https://meetings.HubSpot.com/brooke-bond/figma-design-kit?uuid=ffc6e7b5-32e9-47ab-9f20-6e921b786b1b|please sign up here> to meet with me for 30 minutes so I can learn more about how you've used it, etc. Thanks in advance!
